Title: As a new user, verify the infinite loader is not visible on recently view section on home page
Pre-Conditions: User should be login to site with new credentials
Steps Action:
1- Go to Home Page
2- Click on recently view section and observe loader is not visible and data is showing correctly without any delay
Steps Results:
1-User should be on home page
2- Infinte loader should not be visible and data should be shown correctly on recently view section unde table

Title: To verify  all tabs in various browser is not showin the infinite loader and showing the correct data
